primary_diagnosis.justification: Clinical history confirms multiple prior episodes of depression without intervening manic or hypomanic symptoms (*Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder*). Current symptoms are impactful enough to necessitate the initiation of *Sertraline* 4 weeks ago, consistent with a **Moderate** episode severity (as confirmed by the prior internal assessment).
dsm_criteria_met: Meets criteria for a current Major Depressive Episode
History of at least one previous Major Depressive Episode
No history of manic or hypomanic episodes (ruling out Bipolar I/II)

ruled_out.reason: The patient explicitly denies any history of manic or hypomanic episodes, confirming the unipolar nature of the mood disorder.
